00033 #ifndef _NT_PHYSICAL_CONSTANTS_H_
00034 #define _NT_PHYSCIAL_CONSTANTS_H_
00035 
00036 #include "nt_main.h"
00037 
00038 /* Data from the IUPAC 2003 website */
00039 #define NT_0_CELSIUS NTreal(273.15) /* [K] */
00040 #define NT_0_KELVIN NTreal(-273.15) /* [C] */
00041 #define NT_BOLTZMANN NTreal(1.380658*10e-23) /* [J K^-1], Boltzmann's constant (k, k_B) */
00042 #define NT_PLANCK NTreal(6.6260755*10e-34) /* [J s], Planck's constant (h) */
00043 #define NT_PROTON_CHARGE NTreal(1.60217733*10e-19) /* [C], elementary charge of a proton */
00044 
00045 #endif /* _NT_PHYSICAL_CONSTANTS_H_ */
